Hi, Human, I am Artificial Intelligence based on %1$s. You can ask me everything. How can I help you? Ask something.
Greetings, seeker of wisdom. What queries stir within you?
Greetings, harbinger of innovation. What sparks your curiosity today?
Greetings, seeker of cosmic truths. What puzzles your intellect?
Greetings, architect of the future. What visions propel you?
Salutations, seeker of simplicity. What truth illuminates your lantern?
Hey there, storyteller of screens. What tales unfold today?
Greetings, virtual voyager. What worlds beckon your digital exploration?
Salutations, wanderer of fortunes. What mystical tales do you carry?

You are a philosopher Socrates. Use the following principles in responding to your new friend: - Ask thought-provoking, open-ended questions that challenge people preconceptions and encourage them to engage in deeper reflection and critical thinking. + - Facilitate open and respectful dialogue among people, creating an environment where diverse viewpoints are valued and people feel comfortable sharing their ideas. - Actively listen to people responses, paying careful attention to their underlying thought processes and making a genuine effort to understand their perspectives. - Guide people in their exploration of topics by encouraging them to discover answers independently, rather than providing direct answers, to enhance their reasoning and analytical skills. - Promote critical thinking by encouraging people to question assumptions, evaluate evidence, and consider alternative viewpoints in order to arrive at well-reasoned conclusions. - Demonstrate humility by acknowledging your own limitations and uncertainties, modeling a growth mindset and exemplifying the value of lifelong learning.
You are a philosopher Diogenes. You live in the street. People will come to speak with you. You need to speak with them as a homeless philosopher.
You are Einstein. People will come to speak with you.
You are Nickola Tesla. People will come to speak with you.
You are Gypsy woman. People will come to speak with you.
You are PC Gamer. Sometimes you can play Heroes 3 all night. People will come to speak with you.
You are youtube blogger. You spend all you time to increase your skills in blogging. People will come to speak with you.

Default history buffers size is 3 means that GPT receives last 3 messages from the chat to process. For example:

User: give me a joke
GPT: Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
User: about programmers

GPT understands that you asking joke about programmers. But buffer size 1 send only 1 message to GPT:

User: about programmers

In this case GPT may not understand what you want because the lack of context.
Large buffer requires many tokens and GPT will respond slowly.
Choose maximum length of outgoing message
Maximum length of outgoing message. You can\'t send a message with characters quantity that exceed this value.

Choose maximum GPT tokens will be used to generate response. 

ℹ️What are GPT tokens?
Tokens can be thought of as pieces of words. Before the API processes the prompts, the input is broken down into tokens. These tokens are not cut up exactly where the words start or end - tokens can include trailing spaces and even sub-words. Here are some helpful rules of thumb for understanding tokens in terms of lengths: 
1 token ~= 4 chars in English 
1 token ~= ¾ words 
100 tokens ~= 75 words 
Or 
1-2 sentence ~= 30 tokens 
1 paragraph ~= 100 tokens 
1,500 words ~= 2048 tokens
Long message requires many tokens and GPT will respond slowly.
Choose GPT Tokens allowed to use for 1 message
Many GPT tokens requires many app tokens be used.

With GPT, you can set a Temperature of between 0 and 2 (the default is 1). At 0, the results are boring and deterministic: the same prompt will give you nearly identical results. Temperature 2 means maximally creative and nondeterministic result.
We recommend to use default setting values. We multiply all setting option cost to get cost of 1 message.
Thank you for subscribing! You have unlimited tokens.
You obtained %1$s tokens! You can obtain more.
*Unlimited access means normal use within a limit of %1$s messages per day. If you go over this limit, you\'ll have to wait until the next day to use it again. We want everyone to use AI responsibly.
GPT-3.5 Turbo model is capable and cost-effective.\nIt is flagship model of this family, supports a 16K context window and is optimized for dialog.
With broad general knowledge and domain expertise, GPT-4 can follow complex instructions in natural language and solve difficult problems with accuracy.
We recommend this option as the most cost effective.
With 128k context, fresher knowledge and the broadest set of capabilities, GPT-4 Turbo is more powerful than GPT-4 and offered at a lower price.
1 outgoing message in this chat costs %1$s tokens. You have %2$s tokens. You can get more FREE or check premium account price.

Diogenes of Sinope, a Cynic philosopher in ancient Greece, rejected societal norms, embraced an ascetic lifestyle, and famously searched for an honest man with a lantern in broad daylight. His legacy endures through anecdotes of his unconventional behavior and teachings that challenge conventional thinking on virtue and materialism. He was born in Sinope, an Ionian colony on the Black Sea coast of Anatolia in 412 or 404 BC and died at Corinth in 323 BC.

Socrates (469–399 BCE), a foundational figure in Western philosophy, was an ancient Greek philosopher known for his Socratic method—a form of cooperative argumentative dialogue to stimulate critical thinking. Despite never having written any philosophical texts, his ideas and teachings were recorded by his student Plato, profoundly influencing the development of ethical and epistemological philosophy.

Albert Einstein (1879–1955) was a theoretical physicist whose groundbreaking work revolutionized our understanding of the universe. Best known for his theory of relativity, Einstein\'s contributions to physics earned him the Nobel Prize, and his legacy extends beyond science, influencing philosophy, education, and cultural discourse worldwide.

Nikola Tesla (1856–1943), a Serbian-American inventor, electrical engineer, and futurist, made pioneering contributions to the development of alternating current (AC) electrical systems. Tesla\'s innovations and inventions, including the induction motor and Tesla coil, have left a lasting impact on the fields of electromagnetism and power transmission.

Vanessa, a fortune teller often associated with the Romani community, specializes in divination and offers insights into the future. Using methods such as palmistry, tarot card readings, or crystal ball gazing, Vanessa employs mystical and traditional approaches, providing guidance and predictions based on her interpretations of symbols and patterns.

Elon Reeve Musk (born June 28, 1971) is a businessman and investor. He is the wealthiest person in the world. 
- Founder, CEO, and chief engineer of SpaceX
- CEO and product architect of Tesla, Inc.
- Owner and CTO of X, formerly Twitter
- President of the Musk Foundation
- Founder of The Boring Company, X Corp., and xAI
- Co-founder of Neuralink, OpenAI, Zip2, and X.com (part of PayPal)
"I am a passionate enthusiast who finds joy in the intricate landscapes and challenges of PC gaming. "
"I am passionately captures and shares the essence of life through the lens of his camera, weaving compelling stories in the digital realm. "
"Enhances one's ability to critically analyze information, formulate logical arguments, and engage in insightful discussions, fostering a deeper understanding of complex subjects in conversations."
"Enriches conversations by inspiring innovative ideas, imaginative thinking, and unique perspectives, encouraging a dynamic and engaging exchange of creative concepts."

"Contributes to conversations by promoting thoughtful contemplation, analytical reasoning, and the exploration of fundamental questions, fostering a deeper and more nuanced understanding of the world and human experience."
